listOfQuestions.question: What is the name of the girl who lost her glass slipper at the ball?
In which fairy tale does a young girl encounter a wolf on her way to visit her grandmother?
What is the name of the princess who pricked her finger on a spinning wheel?
In 'Jack and the Beanstalk', what does Jack trade for the magic beans?
What type of animal helps Cinderella get ready for the ball?
Who is the author of 'The Little Mermaid'?
What did the Evil Queen give to Snow White to put her into a deep sleep?
In 'The Frog Prince', what must the princess do to break the spell?
What is the name of the giant in 'Jack and the Beanstalk'?
In 'Rapunzel', what does the witch do when she discovers Rapunzel has been seeing a prince?
What do the three bears in 'Goldilocks and the Three Bears' find when they return home?
Which fairy tale features a character who is forced to spin straw into gold?
What is the name of the kingdom in 'Beauty and the Beast'?
In 'The Twelve Dancing Princesses', how do the princesses escape every night?
What does the wicked fairy curse in 'Sleeping Beauty'?
listOfQuestions.correctAnswer: That she will prick her finger and fall asleep
wrongAnswers: That she will turn into a beast
That she will be lost forever

listOfQuestions.question: In 'The Pied Piper of Hamelin', what does the piper use to lure the rats away?

In 'The Boy Who Cried Wolf', what lesson is taught?
What is the primary setting of 'Alice in Wonderland'?
Why did the Gingerbread Man run away?
listOfQuestions.correctAnswer: He was baked and wanted to escape
